mainBoard.name: Ember Beast
mainBoard.originalText: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

rulings.text: Ember Beast can’t attack or block unless another creature is also assigned to attack or block at the same time. Notably, two Ember Beasts can attack or block together.
Once Ember Beast has been declared as an attacker or blocker, it doesn’t matter what happens to the other creature(s).

Other creatures assigned to attack alongside Ember Beast don’t have to attack the same player or planeswalker. Other creatures assigned to block alongside Ember Beast don’t have to block the same creature as Ember Beast.

mainBoard.text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The Boros lack vision. Give them a convenient scapegoat and they'll be blind to the true threats."
—Lazav

foreignData.flavorText: „Den Boros fehlt es an Weitblick. Gib ihnen einen bequemen Sündenbock, und sie schließen die Augen vor den wahren Bedrohungen." —Lazav
foreignData.name: Großer Raubzug
foreignData.text: Der Große Raubzug fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl so viele Schadenspunkte zu, wie du Kreaturen kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: "Los boros carecen de visión. Si les das el chivo expiatorio adecuado, estarán ciegos ante las auténticas amenazas."—Lazav

foreignData.text: La Incursión masiva hace daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo igual al número de criaturas que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Les Boros ont la vue basse. Offrez-leur un bouc émissaire crédible et ils sont aveugles à la vraie menace. » —Lazav

foreignData.flavorText: "I Boros mancano di lungimiranza. Date loro un capro espiatorio e non vedranno le vere minacce." —Lazav

foreignData.flavorText: 「ボロス軍は洞察力に欠けている。適当な身代わりさえ与えてやれば、あやつらの目に真の脅威は映らないだろう。」――ラザーヴ
foreignData.name: 大規模な奇襲

foreignData.flavorText: "보로스는 코앞에 있는 것만 보지. 적당한 미끼만 던져주면 진짜 위협은 보지 못해." —라자브
foreignData.name: 대규모 급습
foreignData.text: 생물 한 개나 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 대규모 급습은 그 목표에게 당신이 조종하는 생물 수만큼의 피해를 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Os Boros não têm visão. Dê-lhes um bode expiatório conveniente e eles ficarão cegos para as verdadeiras ameaças."— Lazav

foreignData.text: Ataque Maciço causa dano à criatura ou jogador alvo igual ao número de criaturas que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: «Боросы не видят дальше своего носа. Если есть на кого свалить вину, они так и не заметят настоящей угрозы». — Лазав

mainBoard.name: Structural Collapse
mainBoard.originalText: Target player sacrifices an artifact and a land. Structural Collapse deals 2 damage to that player.

rulings.text: If the player controls an artifact land, they can’t choose to sacrifice that permanent for both the artifact and the land. If that’s the only artifact the player controls, they must sacrifice another land. If it’s the only land the player controls, they must sacrifice another artifact. If it’s the only artifact and the only land the player controls, they sacrifice just that permanent.
Structural Collapse targets only the player. The player can sacrifice an artifact or land with hexproof, for example.
The target player needn’t control an artifact or a land. Structural Collapse will still deal 2 damage to that player.

mainBoard.text: Target player sacrifices an artifact and a land. Structural Collapse deals 2 damage to that player.

foreignData.flavorText: 慈悲の心で入れ。喊声をあげて出よ。
foreignData.name: ボロスのギルド門
foreignData.text: ボロスのギルド門はタップ状態で戦場に出る。{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{R}か{W}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 자비로운 마음으로 이 문에 들어오는 자는, 전투의 함성을 외치며 나갈 것이다.
foreignData.name: 보로스 길드관문
foreignData.text:
보로스 길드관문은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {R} 또는 {W}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Entrem com corações piedosos. Saiam com gritos de guerra.
foreignData.name: Portão da Guilda Boros
foreignData.text: Portão da Guilda Boros entra no campo de batalha virado.{T}: Adicione {R} ou {W} à sua reserva de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: Войдите с чутким сердцем. Выйдите с боевым кличем на устах.
foreignData.name: Врата Гильдии Боросов
foreignData.text:
Врата Гильдии Боросов выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
{T}: добавьте {R} или {W} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreignData.flavorText: 此门前来时尚存慈悲胸怀，归去时锻出响亮战嚎。
foreignData.name: 波洛斯公会门
foreignData.text:
波洛斯公会门须横置进战场。
{T}：加{R}或{W}到你的法术力池中。

foreignData.flavorText: 此門前來時尚存慈悲胸懷，歸去時鍛出響亮戰嚎。
foreignData.name: 波洛斯公會門
foreignData.text:
波洛斯公會門須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{R}或{W}到你的魔法力池中。

mainBoard.name: Boros Guildgate
mainBoard.originalText:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
